description:
v4W.ENko - "PS-14. MetaBall" is demontrating the basic metaball algorithm generated for the "Pattern Standardization" series.  The centers of "MetaBall" structure are generated randomly with the 4 moving vertices and are forming the 4 charge points for the algorithm. The array of concentrated circles are forming the union structure of the "MetaBall" algorithm. 

Packed as GIF. 1024*1024px / 180 frames.
